mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.job_id AS "jobId", a.account AS "account", a.type AS "type", a.from_group_id AS "groupId", a.from_group_url AS "groupUrl", a.offset_ AS "offsetNum", a.limit_ AS "limitNum", a.status AS "status", a.usernum AS "usernum", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", j.id as "job.id", j.name as "job.name"
left join tl_job j on j.id=a.job_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_task( id, job_id, account, type, from_group_id,from_group_url, offset_, limit_, status, usernum, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{jobId}, #{account}, #{type}, #{groupId},#{groupUrl}, #{offsetNum}, #{limitNum}, #{status}, #{usernum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tl_task SET job_id = #{jobId}, account = #{account}, type = #{type}, from_group_id = #{groupId}, from_group_url = #{groupUrl}, offset_ = #{offsetNum}, limit_ = #{limitNum}, status = #{status}, usernum = #{usernum}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
